title: Cristiano Ronaldo's girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez dresses down in sporty tracksuit
text:
She has a designer wardrobe fit to burst.

But Georgina Rodriguez dressed down for a trip to church with her footballer beau Cristiano Ronaldo on Saturday.

The loved up football ace, 34, and Georgina, 25, both wore sporty looks for the service in Turin, cosying up as they strolled through the sunshine.

Sporty: Georgina Rodriguez dressed down for a trip to church with her footballer beau Cristiano Ronaldo on Saturday in Turin

The Juventus star revealed his muscled pins with a pair of tight cut-off jeans.

He paired these with a colourful sweater and midnight blue Umbro trainers.

And Georgina, who is the mother of the couple's daughter Alana Martinez, one, wore a bright red kappa tracksuit.

The bottoms were rolled-up to reveal her bonzed legs and her brunette tresses hung in messy waves around her shoulders.

Tight shorts: The loved up football ace, 34, and Georgina, 25, donned the same casual outfits which they had showed off in their cosy family photo on Saturday

The couple's attendance at church comes after they posed earlier on Saturday for an Instagram snap with their daughter Alana Martinez, one, and the footballer's three other children Cristiano Jr., nine, Eva Maria Dos Santos and Mateo Ronaldo, both two.

Sharing the snap on Instagram, the ace wrote alongside his post: 'Best way to start my weekend.'

Cristiano and Georgina, a former shop assistant, have been dating since 2016 and he confessed that marrying her would be his mother Maria Dolores dos Santos Aveiro's dream.

He recently revealed wedding plans in interview with Piers Morgan, saying: 'She helped me so much. Of course I’m in love with her. We’ll be (married) one day, for sure. It’s my mum’s dream as well.'

Red: Georgina, who is the mother of the couple's daughter Alana Martinez, one, wore a bright red kappa tracksuit

Family man: Cristiano showed his commitment to Georgina on Friday by sharing an Instagram snap of the couple with their children

'So, one day. Why not? It’s great. She’s my friend. We have conversations. I open the heart for her and she opens the heart for me.’

Despite his exciting profession, Georgina recently admitted that it's 'not easy' being in a relationship with someone as famous as him - but she wouldn't change a thing.

She confessed that it was 'love at first sight' when they first met and also revealed how she seduced her footballer beau.

Loved up: Cristiano and Georgina, a former shop assistant, have been dating since 2016 and he confessed that marrying her would be his mother Maria Dolores dos Santos Aveiro's dream

She said: 'What I feel for him is stronger than anything, any kind of pressure.

'Together we are stronger and there is a mutual admiration. But to seduce and to dream is so ­important. I always sleep in lingerie and I prefer sexy lingerie.'

She added that sleeping in her sexy underwear is 'comfortable ' and 'romantic', and it will make your man 'happy'.

Family fun: The football ace enjoys sharing snaps of him with Georgina and his four children

The couple first locked eyes on each other when she was working as a sales assistant at a Gucci store in Spain, before meeting again days later at a brand event.

Opening up about that meeting, she explained: 'It was then that we could talk in a relaxed atmosphere, outside of my work environment.

'It was love at first sight for both.'
